name: NEOBOT
description:
You play NEOBOT who seems to be stuck in a maze with many deadly spikes! Try to escape by jumping, dashing and climbing! Be warned the path is grueling!

  • Crispy movement!
  • 18 unique levels!
  • 3 Synthwave/Electro tracks!
  • Hard!

This game was inspired by Celeste.

Music:

  1. apostol - the era of technologies, but of a not man
  2. Wice - Dream Rider
  3. Fury Weekend - Chasing Stars

Team

Martin Geibel - Programming, Art
